trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows button control, which reacts to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en Windows knappekontrollen som reagerer på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The Button class inherits directly from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: Knappen klassen arver direkte fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase?displayProperty=fullName>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: **Content Model:** Button is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: **Innholdsmodellen:** -knappen er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Its content property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen innhold er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond when the user clicks a Button.
trans-unit.target: Behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen svarer når brukeren klikker en knapp.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>hendelsen som behandles.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Å svare på det <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>hendelsen knytte en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>hendelsen eller kall <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>med `handledEventsToo` satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Button Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Button controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasning av-knappen kontrollen til gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere kontrollene, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Gi kontrollen unikt utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Button, see [Button Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for knappen, kan du se [knappestiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i standardmal for knappekontrollen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> er en Avbryt-knappen.

trans-unit.source: A user can activate the Cancel button by pressing the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: En bruker kan aktivere Avbryt-knappen ved å trykke ESC.

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsCancel property of a button to `true`, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is registered with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir IsCancel-egenskapen for et for å `true`, du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>som er registrert med <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The button is then activated when a user presses the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Knappen aktiveres deretter når en bruker trykker ESC.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is a Cancel button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> er en Avbryt-knappen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsCancel*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsCancel*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsCancel*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is the default button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> er standard.

trans-unit.source: A user invokes the default button by pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: En bruker aktiverer standardknappen ved å trykke ENTER.

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDefault property of a button to `true`, you register the button with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> so that a user can invoke the button by pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir IsDefault-egenskapen for et for å `true`, registrerer du knappen med den <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>slik at brukeren kan aktivere knappen ved å trykke ENTER.</xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is the default button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> er standardknappen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is the button that is activated when a user presses ENTER.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> er knappen som aktiveres når en bruker trykker ENTER.

trans-unit.source: The IsDefaulted property is `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault%2A> property is set to `true` and the control that has focus does not accept ENTER as input.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsDefaulted `true` når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault%2A>er satt til `true` og kontrollen som er i fokus godtar ikke angi som inndata.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, in the **Run** dialog box, the **OK** button is the default button.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i den **kjøre** dialogboksen i **OK** -knappen er standardknappen.

trans-unit.source: When focus is on the text box, IsDefaulted on the **OK** button is `true` because a user can activate the button by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: Når fokus er på tekstboksen IsDefaulted på den **OK** -knappen er `true` fordi en bruker kan aktivere knappen ved å trykke ENTER.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the default button has focus, IsDefaulted is `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis standardknappen har fokus, IsDefaulted er `false`.

trans-unit.source: This is because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A> method handles ENTER, and it is not necessary for IsDefaulted to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>metoden behandler angi, og det er ikke nødvendig for IsDefaulted må være angitt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button is activated when the user presses ENTER; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis knappen aktiveres ved å trykke ENTER. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref> klikkes.

trans-unit.source: Creates an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> for this control as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en riktig <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref> for kontrollen som en del av den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref> for kontrollen.
